metadata.title: Can we use interleukin-6 (IL-6) blockade for coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)-induced cytokine release syndrome (CRS)?

body_text.text: Dr. Yufei Xiang was supported by Shenghua Yuying talented program from 10.13039/501100002822Central South University and European Foundation for Diabetes Study (EFSD) fellowship. Prof. Zhiguang Zhou was supported by the 10.13039/501100001809National Natural Science Foundation of China (81820108007, 81600649), Science and Technology Major Project of Hunan Province (2017SK1020).
B.L searched literatures, B.L, Y.X and X.G drafted the manuscript, Y.X, X.G, M.L and Z.Z. discussed and revised the manuscript.
No potential conflicts of interest relevant to this review were reported.
